seo: apachedruid信息泄露漏洞,CVE-2021-36749,信息泄露,漏洞检测
seo_en: Apache Druid information leakage vulnerability,CVE-2021-36749,vulnerability detection,information leakage
summary: 该插件用于检测Apache Druid是否存在信息泄露漏洞（CVE-2021-36749），通过构造特定请求检查是否可以读取系统文件。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether there is an information leakage vulnerability (CVE-2021-36749) in Apache Druid by constructing specific requests to check if system files can be read.
